stockmarketsim

Class Client

    • stockmarketsim.Client

extends java.lang.Object

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of this Client. Does not apply any validation to the supplied String, so use with care.
        Parameters:
        name - The String to set the name of this client to.

      • setRisk

        public void setRisk(java.lang.Object newRisk)
        Sets the risk of this Client. Currently accepts any Object so use with extreme care.
        Parameters:
        newRisk - The object to set as this clients risk.
